hello!

I'm a designer (musician, nutritionist) and photographer based in Ottawa, Canada. I specialize in obsessing over fine details while calmly translating information into pleasing visual experiences! Specifically, my areas of focus are branding, web and UX/UI design.

Learning and creating is where I feel best, so I appreciate that design provides infinite opportunities to do both. I am inspired by how each mind processes information differently and love to take a collaborative approach to design through empathy, research and visual translation.

Apart from design, I love reading, continuous learning, spending time in nature, and, when it is safe to do so, making and playing music with the Haig.

thank you for stopping by!
